mapper.select: SELECT user_name userName, nick_name nickName, pass_word passWord, user_type userType, tel_phone telPhone, e_mail eMail, id_card idCard FROM USER_INFO_TBL WHERE user_name = #{userName}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_info_tbl (user_name, nick_name, pass_word, tel_phone, e_mail, id_card) VALUES (#{userName}, #{nickName}, #{passWord}, #{telPhone}, #{eMail}, #{idCard})
